title: Woj and Lowe '21 Trade Deadline Show
description:
Zach Lowe joins The Woj Pod to discuss Toronto's handling of Kyle Lowry at the NBA trade deadline, possible Aaron Gordon destinations, teams interested in Lonzo Ball, and where guys on the buyout market might end up.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
